Delete[Select id from case];
List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c> acctID = [SELECT JBCXM__Account__c FROM JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c limit 100];
	List<String> reasonList = new List<String>{'User didn\'t attend training','Complex functionality','Existing problem','Instructions not clear','New problem','User didn\'t attend training','Complex functionality','Existing problem','Instructions not clear','New problem'};
	List<String> statusList = new List<String>{'On Hold','New','Escalated','New','Escalated','On Hold','New','Escalated','New','Escalated'};
	List<String> typeList = new List<String>{'Problem','Feature Request','Question','Problem','Question','Problem','Feature Request','Question','Problem','Question'};
	List<String> priorityList = new List<String>{'High','Medium','Low','Low','Medium','High','Medium','Low','Low','Medium'};
	List<String> originList = new List<String>{'Email','Phone','Web','Phone','Email','Email','Phone','Web','Phone','Email'};
	List<Case> Cl = new List<Case>();
	for(Integer i=1;i<100;i++){
		Case a = new Case(
			Reason =  reasonList[Integer.valueof(math.random()*reasonList.size())],
			Description = 'Leading university in AZ offering undergraduate and graduate programs in arts and humanities, pure sciences, engineering, business, and medicine.',
			Status = statusList[Integer.valueof(math.random()*statusList.size())],
			Subject = 'Sample Case '+i,
			Type = typeList[Integer.valueof(math.random()*typeList.size())],
			AccountID = acctID[i].JBCXM__Account__c,
			Priority = priorityList[Integer.valueof(math.random()*priorityList.size())],
			Origin = originList[Integer.valueof(math.random()*originList.size())]);
		cl.add(a);
		//System.Debug('Account Name is '+acctID[i].id);
	}
	insert cl;
